is_active.description: Indicates whether the tenant is active or inactive

user_pool_id.description: Unique identifier for the Cognito User Pool of the tenant

identity_pool_id.description: Unique identifier for the Cognito Identity Pool of the tenant

user_pool_client_id.description: Unique identifier for the Cognito User Pool Client of the tenant

created_by.description: Unique identifier for the user who created the tenant

updated_by.description: Unique identifier for the last user who updated the tenant

created_at.description: Creation date of the tenant in %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S format

updated_at.description: Last modification date of the tenant in %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S format

permissions.description: Object containing the modules, components and subcomponents the tenant has access to

admin.description: This object has the name of a module in the application the tenant has access to

users.description: This array has the name of a component in the application the tenant has access to

items.description: The name of a sub-component in the application the tenant has access to
